QuestData.Title: Meetup with the Caravan
QuestData.Description: The pyramid inside of the Maker's Terrace in Uldum can be used as some kind of super weapon that will end all life on Azeroth.$B$B<Belloc thinks a moment.>$B$BYou must continue the good research that you've begun. Head south to the desert of Tanaris. There's a caravan there that's about to leave for Uldum.$B$BPerhaps you can tag along.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Adarrah at Thistleshrub Valley in Tanaris.
